Package jam.sort.stream

Customizable classes defining the data format to be sorted.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
L002Parameters Parameters for L002 ORNL formatted data
L003Parameters Parameters for L003 ORNL formatted event stream
 

Class Summary
BufferStatus Container for the state of the the FIFO buffer in YaleCAEN_InputStream.
EventInputStatus Static instances represent the current status of the running EventInputStream.
EventInputStream A general-purpose InputStream of experiment events that can be sorted.
EventOutputStream Stream to write events out
Kmax6InputStream This class knows how to handle the Kmax data format.
L002InputStream This class knows how to handle Oak Ridge tape format.
L002OutputStream This class knows how to handle Oak Ridge tape format.
L003InputStream This class knows how to handle Oak Ridge tape format (with special headers as used by Charles Barton's group).
L00XInputStream This class knows how to handle Oak Ridge tape format.
UconnInputStream This class knows how to handle Uconn Be7.
XsysInputStream This class knows how to handle Xsys event data format .
YaleCAEN_InputStream This class sorts the native data format of the CAEN V7x5 ADC's and TDC's.
YaleCAEN_OutputStream Not yet fully implemented, but will write out data in a format that YaleCAEN_InputStream can understand.
YaleInputStream This class knows how to handle Oak Ridge tape format.
YaleOutputStream This class knows how to handle Oak Ridge tape format.
 

Exception Summary
EventException Exception that is thrown if we have a unrecoverable error in handling an event stream.
 

Package jam.sort.stream Description

Customizable classes defining the data format to be sorted. The user may implement their own extensions of jam.sort.stream.EventInputStream and jam.sort.stream.EventOutputStream to customize Jam for their own acquisition system.
